name: 2014 RPG Maker Games Bundle
description:
All the games I made in RPG Maker VX Ace, in the year 2014 (plus one from 2015), all in one convenient collection.

PWYW, preserving these for posterity. 

Questions? Comments? My Twitter is, as ever, @8BitGoggles. Bear in mind I wrote these within a month each, so the stories aren't...stellar.
